title: US Cellular Typeface
content: Can anyone identify the US Cellular typeface? [http://www.uscc.com/uscellular/SilverStream/Pages/uscellular.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010122851/http:/www.uscc.com/uscellular/SilverStream/Pages/uscellular.html "http://www.uscc.com/uscellular/SilverStream/Pages/uscellular.html") The one that "We Believe" is set in. I know I've seen it before and it always bugs me that I can't remember the name.
author: jessi.long

comments.content: Rosewood Fill mixed with Emigre's Matrix Script.
marcox, you bet me by a few seconds. haha

Get a similar effect (woodtype slab with expressive italic) with a single typeface by using Oxtail from Psyops.

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/psyops/oxtail\_set/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010122851/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/psyops/oxtail_set/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/psyops/oxtail\_set/")
